title: Oru Pani Thuli Lyrics Kanda Naal Mudhal
stanzas:
karu karu karu karu
kannu pattu vaadi vidum
vaasa malli
sandhanatha poosividunga

aduthathu aduthathu eppavunnu
maamiyaaru ketkum munne
ara dozen pethu kodunga.

thaga thaga thaga thaga
thanga silai thavikkudhu
vetkathula podhum adha
vittuvidunga.

aariraaro aariraao
naalaikkunnu thevapadum
thaalaattula onne rendu
kaththukodunga.

un pani thuli pani thuli
enai suduvathu suduvathu yeno.
en suriyan suriyan suriyan
adhil uruguthu uruguthu yeno

idhu nanavai thondrum kanavu
idhu kaalaiyil thondrum nilavu
idhu kannai kannai parithu
velicham tharum iravu.

kadhalaa kadhalaa
ennamum koosuthe
aasaiyum naananum
sandaigal poduthe

un pani thuli pani thuli
enai suduvathu suduvathu yeno.
en suriyan suriyan suriyan
adhil uruguthu uruguthu yeno

karu karu karu karu
kannu pattu vaadi vidum
vaasa malli
sandhanatha poosividunga

aduthathu aduthathu eppavunnu
maamiyaaru ketkum munne
ara dozen pethu kodunga.

thaga thaga thaga thaga
thanga silai thavikkudhu
vetkathula podhum adha
vittuvidunga.

aariraaro aariraao
naalaikkunnu thevapadum
thaalaattula onne rendu
kaththukodunga.

viralgalum nagangalum
thottu konda nerangal
enni adhai paarththillai
enndru pogum oorugal.

yedho oru thendral modhi
mella mella marinom
unnai naanum
ennai neeyum
engae endru thaedinom

nammai sutri koottam
vandhum thaniyaanom.
thanimaiyil nenjukulle
pesalaanom.
pesum podhe pesum podhe
mounam aanom

un pani thuli pani thuli
enai suduvathu suduvathu yeno.
en suriyan suriyan suriyan
adhil uruguthu uruguthu yeno

mugathirai kulle nindru
kannaamoochi aadinaai.
poiyaal oru maalai katti
poosai seidhu soodinaai

nizhalgalil ulle ulla
nijangalai thaedinen.
neeyaai adhai solvaai ena
nithamum naan vaadinen.

solla ninaithen aanaal
vaarthai illai.
unnai vittal yaarum
ingae sondham illai.

sondham endru yaarum ini
thaevayillai.

un pani thuli pani thuli
enai suduvathu suduvathu yeno.
en suriyan suriyan suriyan
adhil uruguthu uruguthu yeno

idhu nanavai thondrum kanavu
idhu kaalaiyil thondrum nilavu
idhu kannai kannai parithu
velicham tharum iravu.

kadhalaa kadhalaa
ennamum koosuthe
aasaiyum naananum
sandaigal poduthe

un pani thuli pani thuli
enai suduvathu suduvathu yeno.
en suriyan suriyan suriyan
adhil uruguthu uruguthu yeno
